ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T00:29:58 [Issue ID 4000-433818] urn:comicvine:4000-433818 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 09:35:14. [Issue ID 1161115]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Ruben’s new AA sponsor, the mystical-burnout teleporter Dr. Blaqk, has him acknowledging his past errors, apologizing to his fellow superheroes on their moon base, and facing his angry ex-girlfriend. But after a shocking betrayal sends the booze-fueled hero literally over the edge, a demon from his past bursts onto the scene.
Featuring Discharge, the superhero with the worst name!
Cowritten by Toadies drummer Mark Reznicek!
Geoff Shaw’s kinetic art perfectly suits this gritty tale!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/buzzkill-3-past-errors/4000-433818/

ComicInfo.Title: Past Errors
